hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOWD.EOWD_ID,EOWD.CREATOR,EOWD.CREATE_TIME,EOWD.MODIFIER,EOWD.MODIFY_TIME, EOWD.REC_VER,EOWD.REC_STATUS,EOWD.ORG_ID,EOWD.EOWD_EOWR_CODE,EOWD.EOWD_EOWR_NAME, EOWD.EOWD_CUSTOMER_CODE,EOWD.EOWD_CUSTOMER_NAME,EOWD.EOWD_PRIORITY,EOWD.EOWD_WH_CODE, EOWD.EOWD_WH_NAME,EOWD.EOWD_REMARK FROM EO_ORDER_WH_EBCU_DETAIL EOWD WHERE 1=1 << AND EOWD.ORG_ID = :orgId >> << AND EOWD.EOWD_EOWR_CODE = :eowdEowrCode >> ORDER BY EOWD.EOWD_PRIORITY DESC
